email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN BREEZE (DWT: 85000, LOA: 225m) available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. Cargo size is 75000MT on CIF terms. Starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. Laycan is 20-25 October. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Michael Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thanks for the offer. USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Given the current market conditions, I can offer USD 18.00 per MT. Demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

USD 18.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 22-27 October?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 22-27 October. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Michael Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
- Cargo: 75000MT Coal
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 22-27 October
- Freight: USD 17.75 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Michael Harris
